Description:
Effortless Lifestyle Choice
This solid brick and tile family sized home epitomizes modern easy living. With generous room sizes and 2.7m ceilings, this property has a spaciousness that further enhances livability.
Appealing to families and downsizers alike, the floor plan allows for zoned living. A sunny king sized master with en-suite and walk in robe is located towards the front of the property, while three additional bedrooms and a large bathroom are towards the rear.
The heart of the home is the open plan living area. It features a contemporary kitchen with extensive storage; a central island; quality appliances and a large walk in pantry. Undercover outdoor entertaining is easily accessed from the dining area. This is the perfect sheltered spot for enjoying evening BBQs and long lunches with friends and family. A second living space offers flexibility for use as a media room, playroom or as a formal lounge. There is ducted heating and cooling throughout with double glazed glass for all year round comfort.
Super easy care landscaping that almost takes care of itself with an automated watering system, means more of your time will be spent relaxing and making the most of living so close to all that the Bellarine offers. The double lock up garage (with rear door access to the garden) offers ample storage and the garden shed is an added bonus.
You will love the quiet, friendly and established neighbourhood as well as the short walk to shops, playgrounds and parks. Ocean beaches, the jetty, boating and fishing are all close by and Geelong is just a short commute away. This is truly low maintenance and effortless living in a great location.
Insights: 22 View Bella Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
STYLISH DUAL LIVING
This meticulously presented home exudes class & sophistication positioned in a prime location opposite lush parkland and only a stones throw to the Curlewis waterfront. Featuring a flexible floor plan with fantastic dual living spaces making it the perfect choice for the extended family or alternatively ideal guest accommodation. Set on a low maintenance block of approx 353m2, the home leaves you more time to enjoy all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer including award winning wineries, beaches and entertainment. Downstairs offers a Master bedroom with WIR and two way bathroom, a stunning designer kitchen with gas appliances & dishwasher along with open plan living and dining flowing out to a delightful undercover entertainment area allowing for an indoor/outdoor lifestyle. Upstairs comprises 3 further bedrooms including a second Master with WIR & ensuite, bathroom, functioning 2nd kitchen and living space leading out to a balcony with views of the bay! Other features of this beautiful home include quality fixtures & fittings, stone bench tops, split system heating and cooling, ducted heating & cooling and a double garage. Ideal for holiday accommodation, extended family units or entertainers looking for that little bit extra!!

Description:
Watch The Kids Walk To School
The Feel:
Boasting a central position within a premium land release adjoining Griggs Creek Nature Reserve, this 590sqm allotment sits just metres from Clifton Springs Primary and walking tracks to the beach.
Bring your dream home to life on one of the last remaining blocks in this popular neighbourhood, and experience the natural open space, parks and playgrounds of this master planned community!
The Facts:
-590sqm approx. north facing allotment at Bayview Estate Curlewis
-Stunning master planned community with parks and playgrounds
-One of the last remaining blocks in sold out premium release
-Stroll to Nature Reserve enjoying surrounding bushland aspects
-Potential for water views from a second level (STCA)
-Safe walking track and pedestrian bridge to Clifton Springs Primary
-2min drive to Bayview Central, 5mins to Drysdale township
-15mins to Geelong CBD and Portarlington Ferry to Melbourne

Description:
Position & Lifestyle
Presenting an outstanding opportunity to purchase two side by side blocks of land measuring approximately 376.9sqm and 406.9sqm approx respectively.
Set in one of the most sought after pockets of Curlewis, Bayview Estate, is this 406.9m2 (approx.) parcel of land. Situated only a short distance to the shopping centre, local schools and public transport.
A sought after location by many. Perfectly positioned, youll never want to leave. Whether you are thinking of building a single or multi level home, you will be sure to enjoy beautiful views all year round.
The Bellarine Peninsula offers prized access to many famous wineries plus the coastline's array of pristine beaches, walking trails and cultural delights. An increasingly popular lifestyle destination just 20 minutes to Geelong by car and daily ferry services to Melbourne CBD.
A great opportunity exists here to build your dream home, retire or make it your holiday home destination

North-Facing Smart Block
Situated in the heart of the Curlewis growth suburb, adjacent to Cherry Park and a leisurely stroll down the walking track to the shores of Corio Bay. Close to all amenities and Bellarine lifestyle options. Only 10 minutes to the Port Phillip Ferry at Portarlington. Situated on the high side of the street and one of a few remaining vacant lots in the area.
Already titled and ready to build !
Downsize to your retirement haven and travel at your leisure without the worries of a large block to maintain. Block size 448m2

Description:
Your Oceania Oasis Awaits You!
Your bay lifestyle to look forward too is here on this corner perfect 508m2 block of land in the desired location of the Baywater Estate in Curlewis. This is your chance to build your dream home on the Bellarine Peninsula & live the lifestyle of bays, beaches and wineries all at your doorstop. Just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within 12kms to Portarlington which features the Ferry Service. Plus all the local schools, shops, cafes, supermarkets, medical facilities and easy access to public transport. The Bellarine rail trail is also here for all cycling & walking adventures with the Clifton Springs boat ramp just a short distance down the road. Here you have the freedom to build without the frustrating restrictions developers often place on the new estates.

Description:
In A League Of Its Own!!
Showcasing a stunning light and bright 'feel' this executive residence is simply in a league of its own! Top shelf in every sense of the word, this property delivers the ultimate lifestyle prospect! The enviable land holding of 722m2 (approx.) is flanked by wonderful parklands which further accentuates the truly tranquil and private setting.
An attractive façade provides a hint to what is sure to be an outstanding inspection; stylish finishes are complemented by unwavering brief to deliver a true 'lifestyle' home
Upon entry you will be instantly impressed by grand proportions and towering exaggerated ceiling heights
A central hub of this residence is a kitchen/family/meals zone which showcases unrivalled size and scale; crisp neutral finishes, expansive windows and an enviable northerly orientation further enhances the wonderfully light and bright experience.
The kitchen serves up an eye catching design; expansive benchtops, custom high gloss cabinetry, feature tiled splash back and stainless steel appliances
4 generous bedrooms; master is complete with a beautifully appointed ensuite and walk in robe - a quadrant of timber windows promote lovely filtered light. All additional bedrooms are equally generous and have built in robes.
A 2nd independent living zone provides further flexibility to what is already an adaptable floor plan
All the modern comforts; ducted gas heating, split system cooling, solar boosted hot water service, ducted vacuum, outdoor shower and quality fixtures throughout ensure all year comfort
Dual glass sliding doors off the main living area create a seamless inside/outside living area. A fully equipped hardwood decked alfresco under the roofline creates a beautifully sheltered space for the 'entertainer'; complete with built in custom cabinetry with stone benchtop, down lights, ceiling fan, natural gas point (BBQ) and fridge
It is very difficult to find a property in today's local property market that nails the 'lifestyle' brief better; a double remote garage is oversized and is complemented by the enviable feature of side access (secured by dual timber gates) and a sea of exposed aggregate offers a myriad of off street parking options; room enough for the cars, boat, caravan and even the jet ski
In short, this fine property simply ticks all the boxes a wonderful home for today and exceptional investment for the future

Description:
Contemporary, Comfortable and Convenience
Representing outstanding value for money, this Sheridan Home has left no stone unturned and offers thoughtful family living in the ever-popular and growing Curlewis. Don't let the private façade fool you - Expectations will be exceeded!
Situated upon 464m2 block, the gardens both front and back are well established and private giving you a sense of secure and serene living. Comprising 3 spacious bedrooms, the master equipped with direct alfresco access, walk-in-robe and ensuite with over-sized shower, double vanity and toilet. The 2 remaining bedrooms include built-in-robes. A spacious open plan living area, with kitchen overlooking dining, is the heart of the home. The kitchen is equipped with quality stainless steel appliances including 900mm gas cooktop, in bench 900mm electric oven, Bosch dishwasher, ample cupboards and completed by a generous walk-in-pantry. The fore of the home hosts a separate formal living with in-built illuminated shelves, followed by a separate study/home office. The central bathroom with shower, tiled in bath and vanity, separate toilet and spacious laundry with ample storage and internal access to the DLUG completes this quality home.
It's obvious this home has been designed with practical living in mind, being cleverly zoned and offering space for all.
Indoor/Outdoor entertaining is made a breeze with sliding door access from the open plan living area to the outdoor undercover deck, surrounded by lush mature greenery.
Additional features of the home include ducted heating, split system, ducted vacuum, alarm system and CCTV, network points in all rooms, fibre to the home, vegetable garden, two secure garden sheds, DLUG with internal and external access.
Location could not get any better, being situated in a quiet pocket of Curlewis all while being only a 10-minute stroll to the new shopping centre and flanked for choice when it comes to schools, public transport, supermarkets, boat ramp, the Bay and all amenities on offer. The Bellarine lifestyle is ready for you - What are you waiting for?!
*All information about the property has been provided to hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property

Description:
Water Views For A Lifetime
The Feel:
Are you dreaming about building a new home in the Baywater Estate? Looking for bay views that capture the You Yangs and Melbourne’s skyline? It’s time to stop dreaming and start living, now!
This stunning family home is less than two years old, offering plenty of family space for relaxation and entertaining; with all the hard work already done - so you can enjoy your new coastal lifestyle.
The Facts:
-646sqm approx. in the prestigious Baywater Estate Curlewis
-Simonds built with premium upgrades and ‘no maintenance’ gardens
-Surrounded by stunning homes and walking paths to the beach
-Heightened ceilings, windows and doors amplify space and light
-Kitchen with 40mm stone waterfall edge benches, 90cm oven and electric hob, electric hot plates
-Bank of pot drawers, Beko dw, and WIP with refrigerator space
-Gas log fire to OP living with sliding door access to dual entertaining zones
-Formal lounge downstairs, family retreat and study zone upstairs
-3 minor BRs all with BIRs and family bathroom
-Spacious master with WIR and ensuite with water vistas
-Alarm system, Split system heating/cooling to living zones, Gas ducted heating throughout
-Remote DLUG with int. and rear access, wide gated access for boats/caravans
-Large side yard with plenty of room for a pool (STCA)
-Easy access to shopping centre and safe access to Clifton Springs Primary
The Owner Loves…
“I love waking up to the stunning water views, and they can never be built out because of our position. The estate is so friendly, the beach is safe for children, and Drysdale Township is only five minutes down the road!”

Or alternatively if you are looking for a lifestyle change then you can't go wrong to consider moving to the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula and in particular the fast growing suburb of Curlewis. Just minutes from the Clifton Springs boat ramp that sits on the edge of Port Phillip Bay. This allotment measures 392m2 and is titled so you could begin building as soon as settlement occurs. Also available are Lots 1017 and 1018. Call or email today for more information.

Description:
Family Entertainer
Perfectly positioned within walking distance to Curlewis shopping precinct and numerous walking trails, this modern home offers the finest in family living without the hassle of building! Boasting a versatile floor plan this stylish, 4 bedroom, low-maintenance home is not to be missed.
Timber laminate flooring throughout creates a warm homely ambience the moment you enter.
Features included are
-A functional kitchen showcasing a large entertaining central prep /breakfast bar
-With a 900mm freestanding oven & stove top, s/s dishwasher & tiled splash back it has it all
-Timber look overhead cupboards & pantry provide well thought out storage
-Enjoy the open plan kitchen/living/dining area with sliding doors opening onto the over sized fully decked alfresco area.
- Stylish bathroom and ensuite.
-Large master suite.
-Spacious 2nd living area has soft carpeting, making it the ideal theatre room or retreat
Separate study/home office with built in cabinetry.
The home has a double lockup garage as well as boat/caravan parking behind large lockable gates.
This home epitomises the quintessential family home.

Build Your Dream Lifestyle
The Feel:
Tucked away in an established neighbourhood within the popular Bay View Estate, comes an exciting opportunity to secure an easy care block an easy walk to first class amenities, shops and beaches.
Build a substantial home with all the open space of the reserve on your back doorstep, with paths to get you to the water in minutes. Whether it’s for lifestyle or investment you cannot go wrong here!

Description:
Perfect For the Growing Family
4 bedroom Family home in a perfect location opposite the park in very popular suburb of Curlewis built by Henley Homes & just 5 years young. Spacious master is light filled with street views, walk in robe & full en-suite with his & her vanities plus larger shower with dual heads. Kitchen has stone benches, stainless steel appliances with a 900ml electric oven, 5 burner gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher & walk in pantry .Family hub here with an open plan living zone with roman & privacy blinds, stylish grey tiles & sliding door out dining to the pergola. 2nd living is carpeted & separated by a popular barn door. Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 all have built in robes & serviced by a central bathroom with a deep luxurious bath, shower & single vanity basin. Out the back is an undercover entertainment area with exposed aggregate & 2 cafe blinds. Landscaped gardens in retaining walls, plenty of lawn for children & pets to play plus a garden shed. Bonus side access is a rare find with double gates perfect for a boat, caravan or trailer. Additional features are gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar hot water service & some tinted windows with internal access from double lock up garage all ready for you on a 620m2 block. Walking distance to the new shopping centre with a delicious cafe, supermarket, shops & doctors including a 24 hour chemist. Easy access to public transport, local schools, the bay & boat ramp plus award winning wineries, the Bellarine lifestyle awaits you.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Bayside Bliss With Stunning Views
The Feel:
Commanding attention within the prestigious Baywater Estate, this immaculate 4BR family home oozes sophistication and class, while commanding beautiful bayside views a stone throw from the shoreline. Modern, contemporary design meets extreme comfort across two expansive levels, offering a blissful retreat for all to enjoy.
The Facts:
- 676 sqm approx. in the prestigious Baywater Estate, Curlewis
- Set amongst established homes in a pristine bayside location
- Heightened ceilings throughout the open plan living zone
- Study nook and media room offering flexibility as a 5th BR
- Kitchen with stone benches, 90cm gas cooktop and Miele double ovens
- Well fitted butlers pantry and bi-fold servery to outdoor alfresco
- Expansive outdoor alfresco with cafe blinds for year long enjoyment
- Solar heated swimming pool completes the outdoor oasis
- Expansive master retreat boasts WIR, ensuite and private balcony
- 3 further BRs all with BIRs, sharing the family bathroom
- Glistening water views from the spaciously designed upper level
- Ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling and ducted vacuum system
- Triple remote garage with int. and rear roller access
- Wide gated access for boats, trailers and caravans
- Low maintenance gardens, paving and exposed aggregate driveway
- Enjoy the peace of nearby parklands, within a walk to shopping centres
- Central to all of the assets of the Bellarine, surf beaches and wineries

The Owner Loves….
“It’s such a magical location at all times of the year. We love our water views and having direct access to it is so beneficial for all water enthusiasts. Our home is beautifully open and sunny, with plenty of space inside and out for the growing family.”

Description:
A Tranquil Treasure!
This contemporary residence is a fine example of the convenience of estate living combined with a peaceful tranquil 'feel'. Showcasing unrivalled size and scale, top shelf finishes throughout, all the modern comforts one could wish for and wonderful seachange lifestyle features makes this home a 'must see'!
Four oversized bedrooms is no exaggeration; an epic master suite complete with ensuite and walk in robe with the second bedroom spanning approx 4.8m x 3.8m in size
Light filled living areas are a wonderful feature of this home. The primary living zone consists of a kitchen/family/ meals area and second living zone provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
The kitchen presents a stylish sleek design; dual stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, custom splash back; excellent storage solutions and a walk in pantry
A wonderful home for entertaining; glass sliding door creates a seamless connection decked alfresco zone. Mature trees further enhance privacy and seclusion
Ducted heating, split system cooling, landscaped gardens, exposed aggregate driveway/pathways, high ceilings, garden shed and side rear access endorse this property as a great lifestyle prospect
Set within an established pocket of the Curlewis Estate; neighbouring wetlands and parklands, the convenience of local shopping and tranquil walking paths to the waters edge
Call today to secure what is sure to be a hot selling prospect

Description:
It's all about the views!!
This beautifully appointed bayside residence has been custom designed to suit the panoramic surroundings that prestigious Baywater Estate has to offer. sophisticated designer living with spectacular views, superb entertaining zones and high-quality finishes throughout. Overlooking landscaped parkland offering lifestyle advantages, this outstanding home offers the ideal weekend getaway.
* Four bedrooms, two bathrooms plus downstairs powder room. The spacious main bedroom includes walk behind robe and stylish dual vanity en suite with oversized shower, bathroom with WC
* Living areas comprise formal lounge upon entry plus upstairs family room
* Spacious light-filled dining area incorporating well-equipped kitchen with ample bench space and storage options, quality 900mm stainless steel appliances with integrated rangehood, breakfast bar for all year entertaining, oversized stacking doors lead to the inbuilt Alfresco with outlook to the low maintenance rear yard
* Features include high ceilings to ground floor, ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling SS ceiling fans to all bedrooms, single car garage with external access, high quality timber laminate flooring throughout dining and entrance, quality décor and fittings, established landscaped garden surrounds
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
